entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Mono][Codespace] Add mono desktop build optioins #75647
    8.0.0
  • JIT: libraries jitstress failures Assertion failed 'addr->TypeIs(TYP_BYREF)' #75644
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: IBitwiseEquatable<T> #75642
    8.0.0
  • !CREATE_CHECK_STRING(!"Detected use of a corrupted OB JECTREF. Possible GC hole.") running tests under VS debugger #75641
  • [API Proposal]: Remove `where T : IEquatable<T>?` constraint from MemoryExtensions methods #75639
    8.0.0
  • `ObjWriterRid` always defaults to `linux-$(Platform)` on Alpine Linux on non-portable build #75636
  • [UWP] .NET Native compiler can not handle unsafe code *(T*)&var , T with unmanaged constraint #75635
  • Inconsistent large response content validation in HttpClient #75631
  • Consider adding Marshal.PtrToStringUTF8(void*); overload #75630
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Provide a way to start the web workers later #75629
    8.0.0
  • [Feature Request]: Modern library for printer communication and print control #75628
  • Options binding fails on get-only IDictionary<,> properties #75626
  • [wasm-mt] papercut: Emscripten warns about blocking on the main thread even if user code doesn't #75625
    8.0.0
  • .NET AWS Lambda function using .NET 7 RC1 fails to start when using a custom runtime on AWS Linux 2 on arm64 #75622
  • E2E scenario: ASP.NET minimal Web API applications can be NativeAOT compiled for size and performance #75621
  • Zombie thread created by System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection #75614
  • CI failure in System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests - Operation timeout #75611
  • System.Collections.Concurrent.Tests.ConcurrentStackTests.ManyConcurrentAddsTakes_ForceContentionWithToArray #75608
    8.0.0
  • JIT: GDV reorders null checks of 'this' with arguments #75607
    8.0.0
  • Mono JIT/HardwareIntrinsics - Massive failures #75606
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Revisit the size of pthread pool for CI #75602
    8.0.0
  • FailFast event in the event log has broken address / error code #75600
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] app startup regression #75598
    8.0.0
  • QUIC and HTTP/3 tests should log which exact version of msquic they use #75596
    8.0.0
  • ServerCertificateCustomValidationCallback not called when client certificate used and server uses self sign certificate #75595
  • Suboptimal x64 codegen for signed Math.BigMul #75594
    Future
  • Cannot provision wasm in mono when running on Linux aarch64 #75589
  • Consider cleaning up implementation of weak references. #75587
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Remove m_trackResurrection from weak refence implementations. #75586
  • runtime build should use python3 instead of failing #75584
  • Diagnostic port suspension message doesn't report expected port name #75581
    8.0.0
  • improve the gc-heap-size counter #75580
  • NTLM fails for HTTP only connection #75579

Closed

  • DSAKeyValue in S.S.Cryptography.Xml should key for null on `_key` #75048
    Future
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.Javascript does not generate intellisense? #75633
    7.0.0
  • string.IndexOf bug when using Thai culture #75616
  • Reflection-free Native AOT and Enum.IsDefined #75487
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System #72409
    7.0.0
  • [Wasm] AOT support for threading-enabled runtime #70489
    8.0.0
  • blazor wasm and efcorepreview 7 SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlite3 ver 2.1.0 and 2.1.1 preview fails in runtime #74988
  • Empty http error reason phrase produces messages with empty parens #75570
  • Regressions in System.Buffers.Tests.RentReturnArrayPoolTests<Object> #72194
    7.0.0
  • [Analyzer]: Enforce Curiously Recurring Template Pattern in Generic Math interfaces #69775
    7.0.0
  • Get different result when using ToString("F2", new CultureInfo("de-DE") in .NET6 and .Framework4.7.2 #75588
  • Unable to run WebAssembly Browser App from VS or CLI #75356
    7.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Issues with enabling threads in .NET 7 RC 1 #74654
    7.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Emscripten SDK runtime pack is missing multi-threaded static libraries #75263
    7.0.0
  • Various memory usage issues and inconsistencies #70826
    8.0.0
  • net6-android targets - SslStream connectivity issues with self-signed certificates #75536
    8.0.0
  • Debugging information corrupt #66191
    Future
  • [wasm-ep] Wasm.Browser.EventPipe.Sample fails #74487
    8.0.0
  • SPMI runtime tests collection failure: Missing flags on tree #75562
    8.0.0
  • use a string inside RegexGenerator attribute #75583
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\CLR-x86-JIT\\V1.2-M02\\b115932\\b115932b\\b115932b.cmd #75577
  • Consolidate System.Private.Xml tests into a single csproj #75456
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] System.Linq.Expression.Tests - add CallSite to rd.xml #69985
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Indexing with expression does not work #67029
    8.0.0
  • Update msquic to 2.1.1 #75262
    7.0.0
  • Access Violation in CastHelpers.ChkCastClassSpecial #74005
    Future
  • Hot reloading a change in Blazor WebAssembly app after hitting a breakpoint causes browser to crash #75492
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryExtensions.BitwiseAnd/Or/Xor/Not #75578
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.IO.Tests.Perf_Path #75548

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Fix binary serialization of DateTime with DCS and add test. #75650
    area-Serialization
  • Bump release/7.0 version to GA #75649
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Manually backporting #74599 #75648
    area-Serialization
  • Use IndexOfAny in StreamReader ReadLine #75646
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Run all mono, and coreclr jobs when we have mono_excluding_wasm changes #75645
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix `DataContractJsonSerializer`'s handling of -0.0 #75643
    area-Serialization
  • Extend RuntimeHelpers.IsBitwiseEquatable to more types #75640
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Allow for null XmlSerialziers when loading pre-gen from mappings. #75638
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] Bring back readability lost in .Net 6, and stop emitting BOM. #75637
    area-Serialization
  • JIT: Evaluate GDV call args early #75634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable test for x86 #75624
    area-System.Numerics
  • Use determinism instead of timing in cancellation tests #75623
    area-System.Security
  • Add Darc dependency entries for our dependencies on Roslyn #75617
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Implement an AppContext compatibility switch re-enabling reflection fallback in STJ source generators. #75615
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Include inspection of CustomConstantAttribute when resolving default values for parameters via reflection #75612
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • Try re-enabling System.Transactions.Local tests on Arm64 #75610
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Transactions
  • [tests] Disable source generator tests mobile #75609
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Early expand vtable calls on ARM32 too #75604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix LoggerMessageGenerator parser to check for expression bodied method #75601
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • source-build: support building runtime using non-portable runtime packages. #75597
    community-contribution
  • Small diagnostics improvements to HostWriter #75593
    area-HostModel, 8.0.0
  • Fix mono provision-wasm on Linux ARM64 #75591
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution

Merged

  • Check for null keys in DSA/RSAKeyValue #75620
    area-System.Security
  • [release/6.0] Fix build for musl 1.2.3 (backports #67772) #75529
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Group trimming-related smoke tests #75592
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Re-enable multimodule testing #75590
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Port workload fixes from 6.0 #75486
    area-Infrastructure
  • Revert "[main] Pass resource items for VS generated authoring" #75632
  • Only widen short local stores #74685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] load quic early to prevent interaction with tests #75603
    area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.0
  • Fix extraneous parens in EnsureSuccessStatusCode message #75575
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fixed assembly load check on default config apply #75533
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fix prefix writing on TarHeaderWrite #75373
    area-System.IO
  • Fix running WebAssembly Browser App from VS #75384
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0] Simplify and fix the Int128 *, /, and % logic #75567
    area-System.Numerics
  • Bump 7.0 intellisense to RC1 #75582
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm-mt] Disable and fix remaining failing tests on Browser with multi-threading and perf tracing enabled #75286
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix missing flags for IND(str_handle) #75576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Consolidate System.Private.Xml test projects #75499
    area-System.Xml, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Implements eager finalization of weak references #75436
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • load quic early to prevent interaction with tests #75488
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, test-enhancement
  • [wasm][debugger] Indexing with expression #75524
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Update MsQuic to 2.1.1 #75479
    area-System.Net.Quic, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [wasm][debugger] fixing setting a breakpoint in an invalid IL offset after hotreload #75564
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0] JIT: fix incorrect scale in genCreateAddrMode + no-opt #75560
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Assert fat pointers aligned to MinimumFunctionAlignment #75574
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [main] Pass resource items for VS generated authoring #75462
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [wasm][debugger] fixing setting a breakpoint in an invalid IL offset after hotreload #75561
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0][wasm][debugger] Indexing with expression #75559
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #75550
    area-codeflow

Updated

  • Allocate RuntimeType objects on Frozen Object Heap #75573
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] CodeGen verification testing #75102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add portable linux source build leg #75546
  • [release/6.0] Add signing infrastructure for diagnostic binaries #74330
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [NativeAOT] Enable CI for macOS x64/arm64 #75421
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add infinite codegen stress feature to crossgen2 and fix memory usage issues found while doing so #74956
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Split Codespaces configuration based on development scenarios #74683
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Adjust the lpParent of "adopted" child loops #75218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for the Aho-Corasick algorithm in regexes. #71588
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: extend forward sub to handle adjacent assignments #75565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete more verification code #72747
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix numeric IntPtr behavioral changes analyzer findings #75557
    area-Meta
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing some CI trigger changes #75555
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] Add RID for alpine-3.17 + alpine-{x86,s390x} (backports #75396) #75530
    blocked, area-Host, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Add RID for alpine-3.17 + alpine-{armv6,x86,s390x,ppc64le} (backports #75396) #75531
    blocked, area-Host, community-contribution
  • add 0x63 status code #74780
    blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Adding zmmStateSupport and AVX512F, AVX512CD, AVX512BW, AVX512DQ and AVX512VL ISAs. #74113
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove closed issues from issues.targets #75363
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Remove usages of Ubuntu 16.04 from pipelines #75513
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Hardware intrinsics tests in new style #74886
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • JIT: Enhance metrics reported by superpmi diffs #74584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Improvements to CoreCLR Building, Debugging, and Testing Documentation #75569
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Initialization failures logging #75097
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add char[] buffer to XmlRawWriter. #75411
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Updating Vector*.IsHardwareAccelerated to be recursive #69578
    area-System.Numerics, 7.0.0
  • Add RID for alpine-3.17 + alpine-{armv6,x86,s390x,ppc64le} #75396
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Test instrumentation #74959
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use MemoryMappedFileAccess.Read when searching a memory mapped file #67386
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • Simplify handling of multi-reg returns #74499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add doc for CET compatibility. #75551
  • Minor fixes to write barriers #75478
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Do not maintain `GTF_VAR_MULTIREG` before lowering #75449
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement IEEE754 totalOrder comparer #75517
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • R2R fixes for [Equality]Comparer.Default in jit #75422
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Support delegate GDV guards in loop cloning #75140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP][mono][tests] Testing disabled library tests on ARMv6 architecture #75458
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Reflection-mono
  • Implement List<T>.Slice #75383
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove XmlConvert.StrEqual and use Span<char>.StartsWith() instead. #74955
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add more optimizations for (https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/61412) #74806
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Try enabling regions for native AOT. #69108
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Throw invalid program if stack state is invalid #73215
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono] Don't truncate the high bits when ldelema index is nint #73799
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Test against iOS 16 and MacOS Ventura #74809
    NO-MERGE
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • Remove most of string.Trim() usages in System.Private.Xml solution. #75452
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add Vector128 ConvertToSingle intrinsics for Amd64 #75540
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [mono] Add Vector128 ConvertToInt32 intrinsics for Amd64 #75443
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Negate and OnesComplement intrinsics for amd64 #74993
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add extra NativeAOT test legs #73547
    area-Infrastructure
  • AOT ILC using a LKG bits #74435
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
